summary: Frontend testing completed for Becayiş (Job Swap) platform. All requested features are working correctly. Dashboard loads without useNavigate errors, all tabs function properly, profile update works, theme toggle works, and listing creation form is functional.

issues: Üyelik Tarihi shows 'Bilinmiyor' (Unknown) - could show actual registration date from user.created_at

test_results.dashboard_loading: PASS - Dashboard loads correctly without useNavigate errors
test_results.profile_tab: PASS - Profile tab displays user information correctly
test_results.profile_update: PASS - Profile edit form works, display_name and bio can be updated
test_results.listings_tab: PASS - İlanlarım tab shows user's listings with edit/delete buttons
test_results.invitations_tab: PASS - Talepler tab shows sent/received invitations sections
test_results.messages_tab: PASS - Mesajlar tab displays conversations list
test_results.theme_toggle: PASS - Dark/Light theme toggle works correctly
test_results.warning_close_button: PASS - Warning banner close (x) button works and persists in localStorage
test_results.create_listing_form: PASS - Form loads with pre-filled profile data, all fields visible
test_results.edit_listing_navigation: PASS - Düzenle button navigates to edit page with pre-filled data
test_results.new_listing_button: PASS - Yeni İlan button navigates to /listings/create

api_tests.POST /api/auth/login: PASS - Returns access_token and user info
api_tests.GET /api/auth/me: PASS - Returns user profile with completed profile data
api_tests.GET /api/invitations: PASS - Returns sent and received invitations

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Profile tab shows 'Bilinmiyor' for Üyelik Tarihi - could display user.created_at if available
ESLint warnings in useEffect dependencies (AdminDashboard.js, ChatPage.js, CreateEditListing.js, Home.js) - not critical but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Test user already exists with profile and one listing

mocked_apis.OTP_SMS: OTP verification is MOCKED - returns OTP in response for testing, real SMS not sent

context_for_next_testing_agent: All dashboard features tested and working. Test user has one active listing. Profile update, theme toggle, and all tabs functional. OTP SMS is mocked for registration flow.
